Title: Relates to extending the authorization for hunting big game by rifle in the county of Niagara
Summary: Extends the authorization for hunting big game by rifle in the county of Niagara until 2028.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 389 of the laws of 2024 amending the environmental conservation law relating to authorizing hunting big game by rifle in the county of Niagara, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
